/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and vehicles, creating a vibrant tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
